verbs.description: A [ARGM-EXT: much] - [V: awaited] [ARG1: summit] between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has taken a negative turn , with Pyongyang reconsidering its approach and the US likely considering appeasing Kim — and national security adviser John Bolton 's Libya remark appears at the center of the setback .
